name: Demomission
description:
"My boss is going to kill me"

This game was created in 48 hours for the 2020 UniJam.  You play as a construction worker driving a crane-attached Wrecking Ball and must get across the city to destroy the old Light House without causing to much damages !!

Be carefull or your boss is going to kill you !

Credits

  • Pillonel Matthis (No0801) : Developer
  • Thibaud-Game : Game Designer / 2D Artist
  • Ilan OUAMROUCHE (Riûkko) : Developer
  • Baran Lucas (PtitlLu) : Developer
  • Clément Monnot (Saigai) : Developer
  • Lucas Rioust (Rhum) : Developer / Level Designer/ Voice Acting
  • Maxime Freund : 3D Artist
